definition: to repair/to patch/to mend/to make up for/to fill (a vacancy)/to supplement
to stick/to paste/to post (e.g. on a blog)/to keep close to/to fit snugly/to subsidize/allowance (e.g. money for food or housing)/sticker/classifier for sticking plaster: strip
to give an extra subsidy, or bonus etc/bonus/perquisite

sentences.english: Thailand, Malaysia and the Philippines are considering new price controls or subsidies.
sentences.chinese: 泰国，马来西亚以及菲律宾都在考虑价格控制和补贴。

sentences.english: Gathering frequent flyer miles is one of the perks of OCS travel.
sentences.chinese: 积累飞行里程是商务旅行的额外补贴之一。

sentences.english: Greater Khingan Range forestry group, the central government subsidy of $55%.
sentences.chinese: 对大兴安岭林业集团公司，中央财政补贴55%。

sentences.english: As a professional, your position will not be entitled for overtime payment.
sentences.chinese: 作为一个专业人士，你的岗位不会获得任何加班补贴。

sentences.english: One reason is government direct subsidies to farmers and the abolishment of agricultural taxes.
sentences.chinese: 政府直接补贴农民和废除农业税。

sentences.english: But what if ethanol subsidies go away?
sentences.chinese: 但如果没有乙醇补贴呢？

sentences.english: Next, this kind of subsidy harmfully in market fair principle.
sentences.chinese: 其次，这种补贴有害于市场公平原则。

sentences.english: There should be a fixed timetable for their elimination.
sentences.chinese: 取消补贴应该有一个确定的时间表。

sentences.english: The entire “Korean wave” is manufactured through subsidies and tax breaks.
sentences.chinese: 整个“韩流”是建立在政府补贴和赋税减免的基础上。

sentences.english: That's besides foreign wars, limitless corporate subsidies and more.
sentences.chinese: 这是除了外国的战争，无限公司的补贴和更多。

sentences.english: He said demand remains robust despite the lower subsidies.
sentences.chinese: 熊传林说，尽管补贴下降，但需求依旧强劲。

sentences.english: Cuts in export subsidies have not conspicuously shrunk China's massive trade surplus or export earnings so far.
sentences.chinese: 削减出口补贴并没有明显的降低中国的贸易顺差。

sentences.english: The mechanics for claiming this income tax allowance were developed by the district .
sentences.chinese: 该保护区发展了索取这种所得税补贴费的技巧。

sentences.english: The canals merit subsidy in the same way as village greens or urban parks.
sentences.chinese: 运河值得乡村绿化或者城市公园那样的补贴程度。

sentences.english: So the government should subsidise pioneers who break a path for others.
sentences.chinese: 所以政府应补贴为后来者探路的行业先锋企业。

sentences.english: Agricultural subsidization is an important agricultural policy in China.
sentences.chinese: 农业补贴是当前中国支持农业的重要政策。

definition: to give an extra subsidy, or bonus etc/bonus/perquisite
to discount the interest on a bill of exchange
to reduce or waive (taxes, punishment, rent, tuition etc)
subsistence allowance/welfare (abbr. for 城市居民最低生活保障[cheng2 shi4 ju1 min2 zui4 di1 sheng1 huo2 bao3 zhang4])
